section.heading: Enforcement of dealers' rights of association; injunction; damages; limitation of actions

content.p:
ยง 199-n. Enforcement of dealers' rights of association; injunction;
damages; limitation of actions. Any distributor or officer, agent or
employee of a distributor who violates section one hundred ninety-nine-m
of this article may be sued in the supreme court in the county in which
the defendant resides, or where a dealer affected by the violation does
business, for temporary and permanent injunctive relief and for damages,
if any, and the costs of the action, including reasonable attorney's
fees. A plaintiff shall not be required to allege or prove that actual
damages have been suffered in order to obtain injunctive relief.
